Features.name: Step 1: Profile SetUp
Features.text:
Users create profiles with: 
~job sectors 
~job preferences 
~location 
to personalize job matches.

 Click the icon above to bring you to our log in page.

Features.name: Step 2: Job Swiping
Features.text:
Swipe right to save jobs and swipe left to skip.

 Recommendations are tailored to user preferences.

Click the icon above to bring you to our job portal page.

Features.name: Step 3: Saved Jobs
Features.text:
Users can view and apply to saved jobs later from a dedicated section.

Click the icon above to bring you to our saved jobs page.
